purpose: To provide developers with a comprehensive and curated list of tools for managing and optimizing large language models (LLMs) in production environments
principle: Aggregates community-contributed resources and tools related to LLMOps, offering a centralized repository for developers to explore and choose the right tools for their needs
reusability: The list is open-source and community-driven, allowing developers to contribute additional resources and tools, making it a continuously evolving resource
limitations: The repository is a list of tools and resources rather than a functional software package; its utility is dependent on the quality and relevance of the listed tools
name: Awesome-LLMOps
description: An awesome & curated list of best LLMOps tools for developers
highlight: Curated list of the best LLMOps tools for developers
